tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
At the outset, l was glad to be introduced to the clinic HAPPY ROOTS at Chembur and meet Ankita and Abhijit Shetty.  I find Dr. Ankita pleasant, dedicated and gifted with a lot of patience which is rarely seen in dentists.   
I travel from Bandra to Chembur whenever my 3  sons have an appointment , almost twice a week.  And l am satisfied !   I wish her all the best !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was great to meet Dr. Ankita and advise us. We had a few apprehensions and she was very kind in giving us time and walking us through with each step, answering our questions. I will recommend to reach out to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent service ðŸ’¯ All the staff  were helpful. Both the doctors are highly practised n comfort the patients. Treatment is good. Understand the problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ******* very caring and confident.
Well maintained Hygenic clinic. 
Good post treatment care advise. 
Timely convenient appointments. 
Does not rush through during treatment but politely handels everything. 
Good staff as well
We wish the Doctor couple all the best with blessings.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Great experience, had 4-5 sittings in total. This was done between Dr Abhijeet and Dr Ankita. Overall great

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: It was my first time with Dr Ankita and make no mistake I am really thrilled with the experience. She help the patient feel relaxed and all the procedure want smoothly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very happy with the total experience and the patience showed by the doctor in explaining all the pros and cons of the treatment that I have to do

review: Very comfortable treatment.Iam very happy. Treatment with least pain.She is very caring.Excellent treatment

review:
Very experienced and professional and Friendly. Excellent and awesome. Value 4 money. Excellent guidance.  Down to earth. 
 more than any other dental surgeon till date unlike another Doctors like Amit Shah who was rude and rough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I hv been going to Dr Ankita since last 7 years..since been her patient so long she understands the problem I have on immediate inspection of my teeth..so find her treatment to my tooth problems  very satisfying..
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words...
